channel.title: [solved] Changing default gateway
channel.description:
[s]Would it be possible to assign the default gateway manually but configure the rest of the ip settings using DHCP on windows. The reason I want to do this is because I want to be able to host a webserver on this computer when I need it and be able to browse the internet normally.
My only choice at the moment is to find a public dsn server (I have tried a few but not many work) and configure everything manually. [/s]
Basically, I am an idiot and just realised that when I connect to my external IP it brings me to my router page and when everyone else does it goes onto my web server :P

item.title: [solved] Changing default gateway

My only choice at the moment is to find a public dsn server (I have tried a few but not many work) and configure everything manually.
